text: Antônio dos Santos Nascimento (born May 19, 1938), commonly known as Tonho, is a former Brazilian soccer player who played in the NASL. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Washington Whips |1968 |NASL |15||0||0||0||0||0||15||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !15!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!15!!0 |} ==References== Category:Living people Category:1938 births Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Cruzeiro Esporte Clube players Category:Washington Whips players Category:North American Soccer League (1968–1984) players Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in the United States
title: Tonho
